name: Sorry. I'm a Goner.
effect: [Counter] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck. If the revealed card has a cost of 4 or more, return up to 1 of your Characters to the owner's hand. Then, place the revealed card at the bottom of your deck.
trigger: [Trigger] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 8 or less to the owner's hand.
